tag.name: tropes
tag.description: A trope is a commonly recurring literary and rhetorical devices, motifs or clichés in creative works. This use is a broader redefining of a literary trope, the use of figurative language, via word, phrase, or even an image, for artistic effect, such as using a figure of speech. Source: Wikipedia

tag.name: death
tag.description: Death is the state of no longer being alive or the process of ceasing to be alive.

tag.name: terrorism
tag.description: Terrorism is, in the broadest sense, the use of intentionally indiscriminate violence as a means to create terror among masses of people; or fear to achieve a religious or political aim. It is used in this regard primarily to refer to violence during peacetime or in war against non-combatants (mostly civilians and neutral military personnel). Some definitions now include acts of unlawful violence and war. Source: Wikipedia

tag.name: body and host
tag.description: When a foreign entity like that of a symbiote, body snatcher, puppeteer parasite, or even a hacker (when regarding machines like robots and computers) enters/outright hijacks a body, the possessed subject becomes what is usually called: the host. The basic purpose of the host varies on what the point was for it to have been hijacked in the first place. Sometimes it`s used as a disguise, other times it`s used as a decoy and destraction, even simply being used as a weapon and piece of armor that the possessor uses to cause sheer chaos and destruction, but sometimes... a host can be used for fetish fuel.

tag.name: spirit realm
tag.description: A spirit realm is a place where inhabited by the spirits of the dead, deities, demons, and other such entities. Examples would be Heaven and Hell in Christianity, the Elysium in Greek mythology, and so on.

tag.name: speculative fiction
tag.description: Speculative fiction is an umbrella genre encompassing fiction with certain elements that do not exist in the real world, often in the context of supernatural, futuristic or other imaginative themes. This includes, but is not limited to, science fiction, fantasy, superhero fiction, horror, utopian and dystopian fiction, fairytale fantasy, supernatural fiction, as well as combinations thereof. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Ryuudou Yukiatsu
character.description: The protagonist, a 39-year-old drifter with the power of Ayagami. He goes by the name of "Yuki". Originally a son of a Hatamoto Samurai, he left home 25 years ago, after having visited the "Other World". He is the only person known to have visited it and returned.

character.name: Ogasawara Houzaburou
character.description: The 20-year-old leader of the Ayashi of the Bansha Aratamesho. He is also a scholar in rangaku.

character.name: Edo Genbatsu
character.description: A cross-dressing Shinto priest. He fights using several different firearms.

character.name: Saizou
character.description: A young girl who dresses as a boy because of her background in the theatre, where women are not allowed to perform. She fights using a paper fan which unfolds to become a long rope of paper. She was also born with the power to perform a mysterious dance which attracts Youi.

character.name: Abi
character.description: A man from the mountains, fights using a spear which can split mid-throw into four lesser, seemingly magical spears. He seems to have a close relationship with Genbatsu.

character.name: Torii Youzou
character.description: The South Edo Magistrate, Lord of "Kai". A strong supporter of the Chief Elder Mizuno Tadakuni Tenpo Reforms.

character.name: Atl
character.description: An Aztec girl who works in a circus alongside her massive horse, Yukiwa.

character.name: Kumoshichi
character.description: Yuki`s friend, whom nobody except Yuki can see. The real Kumoshichi was Shikiji, a man who Yuki knew about fifteen years ago. However, he attempted to snap Yuki out of his self-destructive haze by tricking and goading him into a life-or-death fight, and forcing Yuki to stab him in self-defense. Yuki blocked out the entire incident, and unconsciously created a Youi in Shikiji`s form. After this, Kumoshichi followed Yuki everywhere and often would give him advice. Yuki was shocked when he realized that he had killed the real Shikiji, and that his longtime friend was actually a Youi he had created. When the horse/dragon Quetzl began running wild, Kumoshichi merged with him and successfully calmed the Youi until it was no longer dangerous. As a result, Kumoshichi only existed after that as a part of Quetzl - a talking horse.

character.name: Tae
character.description: Outa`s mother, who goes on the run to avoid the mountain god that wants her son. She is attracted to Yukiatsu and seems hopeful of marrying him at one time, but eventually settles down in another city with her son.

character.name: Outa
character.description: A youngster offered in sacrifice to a Youi, but escaped with his mother. Outa was supposedly going to be a sacrifice to the mountain god near his village, but it seems to be implied that his father intended to kill and eat him instead (having done the same to the boy`s sister). When the mountain god appeared and absorbed Outa`s father, the boy was exposed to the Other World. His mother Tae took him on the run to escape the Youi, but the boy kept searching for the Other World because of the hardships of this one; after meeting and talking with Yukiatsu, he decides to stay with his mother in the real world.

character.name: Kai Shuuzaburou
character.description: A young painter with remarkable talent. He was once sent briefly to the Other World after he grabbed a severed head which was floating down the river and nearly drowned. He is confident and self-assured beyond his years. He often visits brothels despite being underage, claiming (perhaps truthfully) that he is there to practice his observational art, and because he developed some interest on Atl. He proved to be useful to the Ayashi providing reliable information and protecting Atl from harm in their absence.

character.name: Honjou Tatsusuke
character.description: A retainer of Torii Youzou. He works under him as spy.

character.name: Atobe Yoshisuke
character.description: Biological brother of Mizuno Tadakuni, the financial magistrate and political opponent of Torii Youzou. Ogasawara`s superior.

character.name: Abe Masahiro
character.description: Appointed as Elder at age 25. He negotiated on behalf of the Shogun government with Matthew Perry.

character.name: Tamahei
character.description: A bumbling auxiliary policeman (Okappiki) obsessed with catching Yuki.

character.name: Matsue Sote
character.description: A relative of Honjou Tatsusuke. She is revealed to have gone to the Other World and returned, giving her the ability to breed the Yokai-like creatures the Magistrate use as a task force against other Yokai.

character.name: Ouma
character.description: Atl was reviled for being a foreigner, and had to artificially tint her bronze skin with makeup to pass for a Japanese person. She and her horse Quetzl (whom she called Yukiwa) performed together in a circus, until her status as a foreigner was revealed. After this, Genbatsu arranged for her to be a ward of the geishas he knew in the red light district, although she herself would not become one.

character.name: Yukiwa
character.description: A Youi in the form of a horse that can also become a dragon, summoned by Atl.

episode.title: 妖夷, 来たる
The Youi Arrival
A youi megjelenik
Youi, Kitaru
episode.summary: Edo, Tenpo Year 14. The Ayashi of the Office of Barbarian Knowledge Enforcement secretly investigate the existence of a Youi. Yukiatsu Ryudo encounters a mother and son and gives them refuge, but the Other World appears and a giant Youi comes forth. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 山の神堕ちて
The God of the Mountain Falls
A bukott hegyisten
Yama no Kami Ochite
episode.summary: Mixed up in the fight between the two Youi from the Other World, Yukiatsu, Tae, and Outa are taken to Hozaburo’s estate. But the Youi Yamago appears at the estate and Outa disappears during the commotion. Yukiatsu heads into town to search for him. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 華江戸暗流
Doctrine 3 - Dark Flow of Flowery Edo
A virágzó Edo alatt
Hana Edo Anryuu
episode.summary: Guided by the Ayashi, Yukiatsu enters the headquarters of the Office of Barbarian Knowledge Enforcement. There, the Ayashi once again urge Yukiatsu to join them. Around that time, a Youi of armor was making appearances all over Edo. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 生き人形
The Living Doll
Az élő baba
Iki Ningyou
episode.summary: After a rash of mysterious disappearances, the Ayashi mobilize to investigate. Yukiatsu runs into Atl, a foreign girl hiding her identity, performing with a horse named Yukiwa. The Ayashi suspect Atl while Yukiatsu tries desperately to protect her. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ひとごろしのはなし
Murderer`s Story
Egy gyilkos története
Hitogoroshi no Hanashi
episode.summary: Yukiatsu defeats the Youi that had possessed the life-size dolls, but Atl’s horse, Yukiwa, is captured. Meanwhile, Oshino visits Ogasawara’s estate, saying she is an old acquaintance of Yukiatsu’s and wants to report a crime he committed 15 years earlier. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 竜気奔る
Dragon Aura Running
A sárkány repülése
Ryuuki Hashiru
episode.summary: Yukiatsu regains his memory of the crime he committed 15 years ago. Atl’s horse is being held captive by Yozo Torii. Yukiwa goes berserk when exposed to Youi blood and Atl attempts to sacrifice herself to calm him. Yukiatsu tries to stop this, but… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 竜は雲に
The Dragon in the Cloud
Sárkány a felhők közé
Ryuu wa Kumo ni
episode.summary: The Ayashi array themselves against Yukiwa to calm him as he rages about. Yukiatsu tries to draw out Ayagami from Yukiwa, but is helpless against the coldness that he unleashes. Atl works desperately to protect Yukiwa from the Ayashi’s attacks. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 狐芝居
Fox Play
Rókajáték
Kitsune Shibai
episode.summary: A person disappears in the theatre town, leaving just a mask behind. While investigating, the Ayashi are surrounded by luminous golden foxes. They make it out with Yukiatsu’s powers, but Saizo refuses his help and insists she will solve the case alone. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 面と怨
Front and Back
Fej vagy írás
Omote to Ura
episode.summary: Yukiatsu and the others arrive to rescue Saizo and find her surrounded by foxes, already possessed by the mask Youi. Leaping outside, Saizo’s dancing awakens the spirits in Edo. Ogasawara makes the decision to dispose of Saizo, though Yukiatsu refuses… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 弥生花匂女神楽
Holy Music of Girl Smelling March Flowers
A tavaszi virágok illata, a szűz tánca
Yayoi Hana Nioi Musume no Kagura
episode.summary: Saizo heads for the theatre town, still possessed by the mask Youi. Yukiatsu tries to draw out Ayagami from Saizo but she refuses, fearful of having the meaning of her name revealed. Saizo claims she is a wrongdoer, and her hidden past comes to light. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 日光怪道
Nikkou Spirit Highway
A nikkói út
Nikkou Kaidou
episode.summary: Yukiatsu departs for Nikko with Ogasawara, but their way is overrun with Youi. Honjo and his group also move to destroy Youi. Ogasawara’s old friend, Kanou follows Honjo, waiting for a chance to exact his revenge. Ogasawara tries to stop Kanou, but… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 駁竜(はくりゅう), 月に吠える
Equine Dragon, Howling at the Moon
A sárkány a holdra vonít
Hakuryuu, Tsuki ni Hoeru
episode.summary: Honjo and the others come across stone said to possess strange powers, but it’s stolen by a mysterious group, the Western Ones, who raise an enormous Youi. Yukiatsu fights using Ayagami, but is no match. Meanwhile, Ogasawara faces his old friend, Kanou. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 地獄極楽風聞書(ふうぶんがき)
Record of Rumors of Hell and Paradise
A Pokol és Paradicsom hírei
Jigoku Gokuraku Fuubungaki
episode.summary: Atl is hiding in a courtesan house where a young artist, Kyousai Kawanabe, is being attended. After walking with police hand Tamahei, Kyousai becomes interested in the Ayashi. He is dazzled by Atl’s beauty, who is suspected to be involved with the group. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 胡蝶舞
Butterfly Dance
Pillangótánc
Kochoumai
episode.summary: In Yoshiwara of Edo, someone is killing courtesans. Kyousai is a suspect and Atl is captured as his accomplice. Yukiatsu rushes to rescue Atl. They discover a new victim, and Kyousai realizes every murdered courtesan used to have a butterfly tattoo… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 羅生門河岸の女
Woman on the Rashoumon Riverbank
A Rashoumon démonai
Rashoumongashi no Onna
episode.summary: There’s a serial murderer in Yoshiwara. The Ayashi investigate the butterfly tattoos that have disappeared from the bodies. Honjo and Torii’s other subordinates plot to capture Atl, who is framed for the murders. Kyousai declares that he will save Atl. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 機の民(きのたみ)
The Machine Tribe
Gépek népe
Ki no Tami
episode.summary: Someone has made an attempt on the life of Finance Magistrate Yoshisuke Atobe. Similarly, ruffians who hate Western Learning appeared at a medicine wholesaler called Yamazakiya. Suspecting the two events are related, the Ayashi set out to investigate. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 幽世(かくりよ)
Cloistered World
Szellemvilág
Kakuriyo
episode.summary: Masurao says he sold weapons called “air guns”, which produce no loud sounds or the smell of gunpowder, to Yamazakiya. Learning that his elder sister, Ninai, is at Yamazakiya’s, Abi rushes over where he comes face to face with her. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 三人往壓
Three Yukiatsus
A három Yukiatsu
Sannin Yukiatsu
episode.summary: A man claiming to be Yukiatsu Ryudo appears in the city of Edo. Ogasawara decides they will visit Yukiatsu’s childhood home to investigate the imposter‘s true identity. But having forsaken his home 25 years ago, Yukiatsu cannot bring himself to go back. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 漂泊(さすらい)者の楽園
Wanderer`s Paradise
Csavargók paradicsoma
Sasuraimono no Rakuen
episode.summary: A Youi, Ougu, appears and Yukiatsu fails to draw out its Ayagami. Ougu disappears into the Other World with Nina, leaving their child, Ruido, behind. The Ayashi hide him at Ogasawara’s estate, but are attacked by Narikawa’s underlings. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 不忍池子守唄(しのばずいけのこもりうた)
Shinobazu Pond Lullaby
Altató a Shinobazu-tónál
Shinobazu-ike no Komoriuta
episode.summary: Yukiatsu is reunited with his mother, who urges him to return to the House and take the place of the missing adopted son. Ogasawara persuades Yukiatsu to accept this proposal. The other Ayashi try to capture the boy claiming to be Yukiatsu Ryudo. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 星夜に果つ
To End on a Starry Night
Zuhanás egy csillagos éjszakán
Seiya ni Hatsu
episode.summary: A Youi heads for Edo and turns young maidens into monsters, one after another. The Ayashi mobilize to capture it, using Saizo and Atl as bait. But Yozo Torii was trying to cover up the existence of “the Western Ones”, who are behind this incident. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 帰ってこないヨッパライ
A Drunk Who Doesn`t Come Home
A részeg, aki nem tér haza
Kaette Konai Yopparai
episode.summary: Well water has been turned into sake and the Ayashi mobilize. The cause is a water Youi in Edo’s aqueducts, but it is hard to track, as it has burrowed underground. Meanwhile, Atl meets a warrior sentenced to die and tries to lead him to the Other World. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 印旛沼古堀筋御普請(いんばぬまふるぼりすじごふしん)
Official Construction in Old Canal of Inba Marsh
Csatornaépítés az Inba-mocsárban
Inba-numa Furuborisuji Gofushin
episode.summary: A succession of accidents occurs during construction at Inba Swamp. It is rumored to be the work of a fiend called a black goblin. A youth named Tasaku comes to Edo to get the construction halted. Yukiatsu encounters a Youi that turns people into toads. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 後南朝幻想
Fantasy of the Latter Southern Dynasty
A Déli-dinasztia leszármazottai
Gonanchou Gensou
episode.summary: Atl summons a gigantic Youi named Giei from the Other World. Its appearance causes the Inba Swamp to be swallowed up by an avalanche of debris. The Western Ones appear before the Ayashi amidst this chaos. Using talismans, they can manipulate Youi at will. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ヒトハアヤシ
Intermission
Közjáték - Az emberek mesélnek
Hito wa Ayashi
episode.summary: The Western Ones enter Maejima Temple to bring about the fall of Edo Castle. Ogasawara returns to the Office of Barbarian Knowledge Enforcement with Yozo Torii. The Western Ones summon a centipede Youi from the Temple’s underground water veins. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 嘆きの河
Inferno I: The River of Wailing
A bánat folyója
Nageki no Kawa
episode.summary: First month of Tenpo Year 15. The Tenpo Reform has ended, but the people are still suffering. Vassals are disappearing while fishing in Edo Bay. The Ayashi, who were lying low in the city, head to Tsukudashima Island to find clues on a Youi-like monster. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ディーテの市
Inferno II: The City of Dis
Dis városa
Dite no Ichi
episode.summary: Taking sole responsibility for the crimes against the Tsukudashima fishermen, Ogasawara is sent to prison. He reunites with Choei Takano, who wants revenge against Torii, Mizuno and the Tokugawa Shogunate for oppressing the scholars of Western Learning. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 煉獄山
Inferno III: Purgatory Hill
A Purgatórium hegye
Rengokusan
episode.summary: Choei manipulates Saizo into sending the fire Youi “Red Cat” on a rampage and set fire to the prison compound. Choei breaks out of prison and appears at Torii’s estate. Yukiatsu and the others come running, but Saizo has the Toyokawa Fox attack them. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 地上楽園
Inferno IV: Heaven on Earth
A földi Paradicsom
Chijou Rakuen
episode.summary: Saizo tells Yukiatsu and the others that she cannot return to the Ayashi and vanishes with Choei. Genbatsu and the others follow them and find the shrine that Mamiya was said to have visited. There, they encounter a girl called the “Divine Maiden”. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 神話
Inferno V: Myth
Legenda
Shinwa
episode.summary: Choei’s sword cuts down the Divine Maiden. With her death, the rock wall before them crumbles, revealing a large block of ice with a dark shadow. It is the god of the heavens “Susa-no-O”, who is said to be the first to have descended to this world. Source: crunchyroll
